info.title: Sport events and tournaments organizer
info.description: This is Java Spring Boot REST project for Sport Forum with many features

tags.name: Message Controller
tags.description: Main controller, makes all operations with chats

tags.name: Chat Controller
tags.description: Main controller, makes all operations with chats

tags.name: Fan Controller
tags.description: Makes all operations with fans community

put.summary: put like to post(for all users)
put dislike to post(for all users)

post.summary: create fan (for authorized users works as choosing fav club)

get.summary: get all comments(for all authorized users)

put.summary: update comments(for all admins and comment's author)
put like to comment(for all users)
put dislike to comment(for all users)
admins can update their own chats

post.summary: users can create their own chats

put.summary: users can update name of their own chats
users can update description of their own chats

get.summary: get user by last name(for all users)
get user by first name(for all users)
get News for 1 club (for authorized users)

delete.summary: delete message(for authorized users and admins)

get.summary: get specific comment(for all authorized users)

delete.summary: delete comments(for all admins and comment's author)

get.summary: get comment statistic (for all authorized users)
user can get any chat he has in app

delete.summary: admins can delete their own chats

get.summary: user can get all his chats in app

delete.summary: admins can delete users from their own chats
